import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const [title,settitle]=useState("") const [imageUrl,setimageUrl]=useState() const [description,setdescription]=useState() const [movielink,setmovielink]=useState() const p=useParams() // const w=(async()=>{ // const a= await axios.get("http://localhost:4010/edit/"+p.id) // settitle(a.data.title) // setimageUrl(a.data.imageUrl) // setdescription(a.data.description) // setmovielink(a.data.movielink) // }) // useEffect(()=>{ w()} ) const edit=(async()=>{await axios.put("http://localhost:4010/edit/"+p.id, {title,imageUrl,description,movielink});}) const del =(async()=>{await axios.delete("http://localhost:4010/delete/"+p.id)}) return (

settitle(e.target.value)} value={title} />
